passive.name: One At A Time
passive.description: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> and their follow-up attacks' DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>. After the wearer uses a follow-up attack, apply the Tame state to the target, stacking up to <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> stacks. When allies hit enemy targets under the Tame state, every Tame stack increases the CRIT DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color>.
